backend/main.mo: Main actor for the ICP backend that manages pose criteria, presets, and prompt history using in-memory collections, and exposes query/update methods for saving and retrieving prompts and presets.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that clears the old actor's environmentVariables map and returns an empty new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (bundle size reduction, prompt-only fallback mode, CSS layout fix, dropdown z-index fix) to their relevant source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose of components, hooks, constants, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes and applies base Tailwind directives.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up QueryClient and ThemeProvider, manages generation state, and renders a two-column layout with the form, prompt display, and history panels.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying a dynamic copyright year and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header component showing the AI Image Studio logo, app name, and a brief subtitle describing it as a prompt builder.
frontend/src/components/ImageDisplay.tsx: Prompt-only display card that shows the assembled prompt text, parameter badges, and negative prompt with copy-to-clipboard support, plus loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ImageGenerationF: A large form component for configuring and submitting image generation parameters (body type, art style, lighting, emotion, negative prompts, etc.) that calls the `useSendQuery` mutation and invokes an `onGenerate` callback with the resulting prompt payload.
frontend/src/components/PromptHistory.ts: Displays a paginated, copyable list of previously generated prompts fetched via `useGetPromptHistory`, with expand/collapse support for entries beyond the first three.
frontend/src/constants/emotions.ts: Defines a nested map of emotions (Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear) with three intensity levels each, and exports a helper `buildEmotionPrompt` to retrieve the corresponding descriptor string.
frontend/src/constants/negativePrompts.t: Exports typed preset options for negative prompts (quality, anatomy, style, nsfw, minimal), each with a label and a ready-to-use prompt string.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor or identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage Internet Identity authentication state (login, logout, identity persistence) via `@dfinity/auth-client`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for backend interactions: fetching prompt history, presets, and situation behaviors, plus mutations for sending queries and saving presets.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS with light/dark CSS custom property themes using OKLCH colors, and defines fade-in and slide-in utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider`.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH/HSL color tokens, Inter/JetBrains Mono fonts, glow box shadows, and accordion animations via `tailwindcss-animate`.
project_state.json: Tracks project state (version 5) for an AI fashion/portrait image generation app, documenting known issues (nav dropdown overlap, settings panel CSS bug, deployment budget limits), existing features, and fix requests.
